p: Bacillus oceanisediminis H2T was first isolated from sediment of the South Sea in China 18 and was found to be most closely related to Bacillus firmus 19 and Bacillus infantis 20 by 16S rRNA gene analysis. Recently, Bacillus oceanisediminis species is a rod-shaped aerobic bacterium, Gram-positive and spore-forming, and first isolated from marine sediment of the South Korean coast. 21
